import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import FormControl from "@material-ui/core/FormControl"; import Radio from "@material-ui/core/Radio"; import RadioGroup from "@material-ui/core/RadioGroup"; import FormLabel from "@material-ui/core/FormLabel"; import FormControlLabel from "@material-ui/core/FormControlLabel"; import FormHelperText from "@material-ui/core/FormHelperText"; import "./Information.css"; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { "& input": { backgroundColor: "white", }, "& input:valid + fieldset": { borderColor: "green", borderWidth: 2, }, "& input:invalid + fieldset": { borderColor: "red", borderWidth: 2, }, "& input:valid:focus + fieldset": { borderLeftWidth: 6, padding: "4px !important", // override inline-style }, backgroundColor: "white", borderRadius: 6, }, formControl: { alignContent: "left", }, selectEmpty: { marginTop: theme.spacing(2), }, TextFieldControl: { marginLeft: theme.spacing(1), }, formControlTitle: { margin: theme.spacing(1), minWidth: 140, }, })); export default function Information({ data, setInformation, validateTitle, error, setError, }) { const classes = useStyles(); const { firstName, lastName, age, idCard, title, gender } = data; return (

ข้อมูลส่วนบุคคล

{/* คำนำหน้าชื่อ */} {(!(title === "") && error.titleError === undefined) || error.titleError === true ? ( setInformation({ ...data, title: e.target.value }) } /> ) : (
setInformation({ ...data, title: e.target.value }) } error /> กรอกคำนำหน้าชื่อ
)} {/* ชื่อ */} {(!(firstName === "") && error.firstError === undefined) || error.firstError === true ? ( setInformation({ ...data, firstName: e.target.value }) } /> ) : (
setInformation({ ...data, firstName: e.target.value }) } error /> กรอกชื่อจริง
)} {/* นามสกุล */} {(!(lastName === "") && error.lastError === undefined) || error.lastError === true ? ( setInformation({ ...data, lastName: e.target.value }) } /> ) : (
setInformation({ ...data, lastName: e.target.value }) } error /> กรอกนามสกุล
)} {/* เพศ */} เพศ setInformation({ ...data, gender: e.target.value }) } > } label="ชาย" /> } label="หญิง" /> {/* อายุ */} {(!(age === "") && error.ageError === undefined) || error.ageError === true ? ( setInformation({ ...data, age: e.target.value }) } /> ) : (
setInformation({ ...data, age: e.target.value }) } error /> กรอกอายุ
)} {/* เลขบัตรประจำตัวประชาชน*/} {(!(idCard === "") && error.idError === undefined) || error.idError === true ? ( setInformation({ ...data, idCard: e.target.value }) } /> ) : (
setInformation({ ...data, idCard: e.target.value }) } error /> กรอกเลขบัตรประจำตัวประชาชน 13 หลัก
)}
); }
